price: Mi designio es irrevocable, pero Yo no soy injusto con Mis siervos.
arabic: مَا يُبَدَّلُ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ لَدَيَّ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: mā yubaddalu al-qawlu ladayya wamā anā biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
